name: Memory Lane - The game about not being forgotten!
name_original: Memory Lane - The game about not being forgotten!
description:
I've been working on this game for a few months now and I can finally show you the world I created! But first, let me show you what the game is about:

The trailer:

Memory Lane is a turn based RPG. You'll traverse through five districts of a glowing metropolis, filled to the brim with colorful characters. 

 Interact, chat and sometimes even fight the residents in order to survive the trip down Memory Lane. 

 Everything that you see in this game was once an idea, fabricated by the creator. Those ideas are slowly being forgotten and ended up here. 

 A name is everything in this world. It holds everything that you are. Lose it, and you'll be forgotten by everyone who once knew you. Lose it to somebody else and that somebody will gain your powers and skills. But there may be another way to get strong enough in order to survive. 

 Your goal is the city center. Legend says that an idea that can reach it, will be remembered for all eternity! 

 Choose the way your name will be remembered in this story. And when you reach the end of the road, after you've met all those characters... after you befriended or even slaughtered them: 

 Will you remember their names?

  • MULTIPLE ENDINGS
    Your choices matter! But a choice  is rareley only black and white!
  • A SOCIAL MEMORY SYSTEM
    Delete too many memories and a man might forget the name of his wife. Or a dog might forget where it burried his favourite chew toy! The possibilities of forgetting are truly endless!
  • TURN BASED ACTION COMBAT
    Avoid enemy attacks and increase your damage output with the right timing!
  • AT LEAST 3 DIFFERENT WAYS TO SOLVE PROBLEMS
    A peaceful  one and one for every fist you have!
  • COFFEE BOOSTS YOUR ATTACK STRENGTH
    Just like in real life!
  • MAKE A NAME FOR YOURSELF
    Gain new skills and improve your stats!

Those are just a select few. There are a lot more to find and befriend! This game is mostly about the characters and relationships you build with them,

Additional screenshots

Your journey starts in a dark  industrial district, but you'll soon discover how bright the city can be.

The enemies in this game are more than just roadblocks. They're also a great opportunity for me to showcase my worst jokes! I'm German after all.

Even Memory Lane is not safe from scalpers!

Localization

The game will be released in English and German. Depending on demand, other languages might be added.

There is a kickstarter!  

Klick on the picture to get to the Kickstarter page! You'll find more information there! (There is merch too) 

Social Media

Click on the pictures above and come visit me on my social media platforms! This is also a great way to stay up to date!

The guy behind the game

Hi, I'm Dennis! Nice to meet you!

I'm just a guy who loves videogames. Since I started creating games with the RPG-Maker 2000 back in 2005, I fell in love with telling stories and creating worlds.

In 2015  I entered an indie game maker contest with a friend of mine. We had one month to create a game from start to finish. It was then when I realized that my path in life was set.

I worked on a lot of games, completed a few, learned a lot and also failed every now and then. 

Everything you see in this game was created by me. It's tough sometimes but also pretty rewarding when everything comes together in the end. And if you like what I created, I've reached my goal!

Thank you so much for looking at my game and for your support!
